verses.verse: There was also a <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; for he was the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; to wit, for <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>: because he was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, therefore he had <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

There was also a lot for the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>; for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2507>Helek<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H844>Asriel<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7928>Shechem<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8061>Shemida<s%>: these were the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

¶ But <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, had no <S%H1121>sons<s%>, but <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: and these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, <S%H4244>Mahlah<s%>, and <S%H5270>Noah<s%>, <S%H2295>Hoglah<s%>, <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, and <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%>.

And they came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%>. Therefore according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>.

And there <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2256>portions<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, beside the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, which were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>;

Because the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H5157>had<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>: and the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> had the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was from <S%H836>Asher<s%> to <S%H4366>Michmethah<s%>, that lieth <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H1980>along<s%> on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> unto the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5887>En-tappuah<s%>.

Now <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%>: but <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> on the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> belonged to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>;

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7071>Kanah<s%>, <S%H5045>southward<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>: these <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> are <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> also was on the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>, and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> of it were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>:

<S%H5045>Southward<s%> it was <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%>, and <S%H6828>northward<s%> it was <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%>, and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> is his <S%H1366>border<s%>; and they met <S%H6293>together<s%> in <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and in <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%>.

And <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had in <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and in <S%H836>Asher<s%> <S%H1052>Beth-shean<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5874>Endor<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, even <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5316>countries<s%>.

Yet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the inhabitants of those <S%H5892>cities<s%>; but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H776>land<s%>.

Yet it came to pass, when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were waxen <S%H2388>strong<s%>, that they <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to <S%H4522>tribute<s%>; but did not <S%H3423>utterly<s%> drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why hast thou <S%H5414>given<s%> me but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2256>portion<s%> to <S%H5159>inherit<s%>, seeing I am a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, forasmuch <S%H5704>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me <S%H3541>hitherto<s%>?

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> them, If thou be a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, then get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H3293>wood<s%> country, and cut <S%H1254>down<s%> for thyself there in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> and of the <S%H7497>giants<s%>, if <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> be too <S%H213>narrow<s%> for thee.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H2022>hill<s%> is not <S%H4672>enough<s%> for us: and all the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> have <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, both they who are of <S%H1052>Beth-shean<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and they who are of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, even to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and to <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou art a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and hast <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%>: thou shalt not have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> only:

But the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall be thine; for it is a <S%H3293>wood<s%>, and thou shalt cut it <S%H1254>down<s%>: and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> of it shall be thine: for thou shalt drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, though they have <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and though they be <S%H2389>strong<s%>.
